column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The flavor of the lemon tart was great -- the lemon notes in the custard came out well
column2: although I would have liked a little softer crust -- it made it hard to eat with a fork. Twas pretty stiff. As for the coffee
column3: it was more on the sour versus bitter side. They give it to you unsweetened and you have the option of skim
column5: or almond milk to add to your liking. Several types of sugar/sweetener are also available
